article.title: The radial abundance gradient of oxygen towards the Galactic anticentre

multiple_choice_question.text: Which of the following HII regions shows the **largest** extracted area?
Which of the following HII regions is **NOT** shown in a GTC g-band acquisition image?
What is the main reason for using the R2500V grism instead of R1000B in the wavelength range between 4430 and 6020 Å?
The [NII] λ5755 auroral line is clearly detected in the spectra of all the HII regions shown. Which HII region displays the **weakest** signal for this line?
The [O III] λ4363 auroral line is not detected in two of the HII regions shown. For these two regions, how is Te([OIII]) estimated?
choices: Using Te([N II]) and an empirical relation

multiple_choice_question.text: What type of emission lines are CII λ4267 and OII Multiplet 1 λ4650?
What does the figure suggest about the radial oxygen abundance gradient beyond R25?
choices: It shows a strong local inhomogeneity.

multiple_choice_question.text: Which telescope was used to observe Sh 2-298?
What is the value of the reddening coefficient, c(Hβ), for Sh 2-100?
Which HII region in this table has the highest observed Hβ line flux, F(Hβ)?
In what wavelength range is the second-order contamination present in the OSIRIS R1000B grism data?
Which HII region in the additional sample is closest to the Sun?
Which atomic dataset is used to calculate the collisional strengths for Ne²⁺?
What is the value of Te([O III]) for Sh 2-127?
Which of the following HII regions has the highest electron density, Ne([S II])?
For which HII region is Te([O III]) estimated from Te([N II]) and Equation 3 of Esteban et al. (2009)?
